subsection.name: Access through a Proxy
subsection.p: The Subversion client can go through a proxy, if you configure it to do so. First, edit your servers configuration file to indicate which proxy to use. The file's location depends on your operating system. On Linux or Unix it is located in the directory ~/.subversion. On Windows it is in %APPDATA%\Subversion (try echo %APPDATA%, note this is a hidden directory).

There are comments in the file explaining what to do. If you don't have that file, get the latest Subversion client and run any command; this will cause the configuration directory and template files to be created.
